commands.name: az devops security group create
commands.summary: Create a new Azure DevOps group.
commands.syntax:
az devops security group create [--description]
                                [--detect {false, true}]
                                [--email-id]
                                [--groups]
                                [--name]
                                [--org]
                                [--origin-id]
                                [--project]
                                [--scope {organization, project}]
examples:
az devops security group create --name 'Some group name'
--description 'Something to describe this group'

Get object ID of an existing AAD group
az ad group show -g '{Group Name}'
az devops security group create --origin-id '{Object ID}' --groups 'vssgp.someDescriptorForGroup'

az devops security group create --email-id '{Email ID of AAD group}'
--groups 'vssgp.someDescriptorForGroup'

az devops security group create --name 'Some group name'
--groups 'vssgp.someDescriptorForGroupOne,vssgp.someDescriptorForGroupTwo'

commands.name: az devops security group delete
commands.syntax:
az devops security group delete --id
                                [--detect {false, true}]
                                [--org]
                                [--yes]

commands.name: az devops security group list
commands.summary: List all the groups in a project or organization.
commands.syntax:
az devops security group list [--continuation-token]
                              [--detect {false, true}]
                              [--org]
                              [--project]
                              [--scope {organization, project}]
                              [--subject-types]

commands.name: az devops security group show
commands.syntax:
az devops security group show --id
                              [--detect {false, true}]
                              [--org]

commands.name: az devops security group update
commands.summary: Update name AND/OR description for an Azure DevOps group.
commands.syntax:
az devops security group update --id
                                [--description]
                                [--detect {false, true}]
                                [--name]
                                [--org]
